Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: In today's social media world expressing ideas in 280 characters or less is a norm. These people showcase the power of social media by sharing their opinions on various topics. The upcoming Budget2023 has made headlines with the Women's Economic Equality Taskforce providing recommendations and the question arises: Why do we need advice from IMF? The Australia Institute conducted research showing that the Stage 3 tax cuts are costly and irresponsible and it's time to scrap them. Father Bob gets some love and the government has the chance to do what's right for some of the most disadvantaged people but are they determined not to?
